Sentencas: Ag has been shown to be a good metal for SOFC anode cermets using CO fuel.
Titulo: Ag as an Alternative for Ni in Direct Hydrocarbon SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: Here we have expanded on the work reported by testing Ag-YSZ cermets against different hydrocarbon based fuel (H-2 and CH4).
Titulo: Ag as an Alternative for Ni in Direct Hydrocarbon SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: This study shows that while Ag is a good current collector, it alone does not have the required catalytic activity for the direct oxidation of hydrocarbon based fuels needed to be used in SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Ag as an Alternative for Ni in Direct Hydrocarbon SOFC Anodes

Sentencas: As such an additional catalytic material (e.g. CeO2) needs to be present when using fuels other then CO.
Titulo: Ag as an Alternative for Ni in Direct Hydrocarbon SOFC Anodes
